column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The wait was about 45 min on a Friday morning. The staff was friendly
column2: attentive and polite. This place is very popular and noisy
column3: though largely sounds of laughter and joy. This place is very family friendly and attracts tourists visiting nearby Millennium park and the art institute. I had the Florence Benedict with fruit
column4: and it was aight. I should have ordered the pancakes.
